subject: Steering Wheel compitability
description_text:
Hello,

I just wanted to ask what extra parts I would need to get your steering
wheel working with my simagic alpha mini wheelbase?
Is it enough if i just take the qr option, I don't really understand those
options on your shopping website.

Kindest regards,
Ioan

conversations.body_text: Hi Ioan Rusu,     Our steering wheel quick release uses a 70 mm bolt pattern. To connect it to a Simagic base, an additional adapter is required.
